data.text:
The International Seminar will elaborate the discussion on the development of modern tools and techniques for detection and treatment of cancer and various emerging and existing infectious diseases across all the scientific frontiers. The international seminar will enrich and spread the knowledge of current status and future prospective of various therapeutic and preventive measures for cancer and infectious diseases across the globe.

The objectives of the seminar are as follows-

To enrich knowledge about the development of various therapeutic strategies against cancer and infectious diseases.

To dissect the molecular mechanism of cancer and different infectious diseases and development of vaccines and drugs.

To discuss the advancements in phytochemistry and Ayurvedic medicines to combat cancer and infectious diseases.

To elucidate the role of Nanotechnology, Bioinformatics and NGS approaches in the treatment, detection and prevention of cancer and infectious diseases.

Paper Submission Guidelines

Abstracts for papers within the broad theme of the Seminar are invited from researches at all stages of their careers. As this is a Hybrid Seminar, participation, presentation and submission will be possible in ONLINE Mode for outstation participants.
